import React, { createContext, useContext, useState } from 'react'; import { useCart } from "react-use-cart" import './ItemCard.css' const ItemCard = (props) => { const { addItem } = useCart() return (

{props.title}
Rating:

{props.rating}

Stock:

{props.quantity}

${props.price}

) } export default ItemCard
